summary: An American in London, down on his luck, runs into a beautiful blonde in a bar who offers him a lot of money to marry her. Broke and unemployed, he takes her up on it. When he wakes up the ... See full summary Â»
cast: Dane Clark|Belinda Lee|Betty Ann Davies|Eleanor Summerfield|Andrew Osborn|Harold Lang|Jill Melford|Alvys Maben|Michael Golden|Nora Gordon|Alfie Bass|Arnold Diamond|Ann Gow|Lindsay Hooper|Cleo Laine|Delphi Lawrence|Arthur Lovegrove|Joe Phelps|Olive Sloane
title: Murder by Proxy
